div.div: Western New England vs. Mass. Maritime
at Buzzards Bay, Mass. | Clean Harbors

tr.td: Massachusetts Maritime wins the toss and defers to second half.
Jake Bickley kickoff 58 yards to the WNE12, Mike Graham return 16 yards to the WNE28 (Mike Bois).
John Krafick pass complete to B. Thompson for 3 yards to the WNE31 (Chris Pisani), PENALTY MAM face mask 15 yards to the WNE46, 1ST DOWN WNE.
JJ Jachym rush for 1 yard to the WNE47 (Donnie Sheridan).
